item.title: BnFAX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC05G0364600WE Gene Symbol: BnFAX6 Gene Name: Fatty Acid Export 6 Genome: ZS11 reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Fatty acid export protein BnFAX6 functions in lipid synthesis and axillary bud growth in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnGRF2a1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2a1 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: GhDGAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A07G0132.1 Gene Symbol: GhDGAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Seed-specific overexpression of cotton GhDGAT1 gene leads to increased oil accumulation in cottonseed.

item.title: GhFAD2-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A13G1850 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2-1A Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database (https://cottonfgd.

item.title: GmDGAT1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: glyma.17g053300 Gene Symbol: GmDGAT1b Gene Name: Diacylglycerol acyltransferase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We previously identified a soybean DGAT1b variant modified with 14 amino acid substitutions (GmDGAT1b-MOD) that increases total oil content by 3 percentage points when overexpressed in soybean seeds.

item.title: GmFATA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gyma.18G167300 Gene Symbol: GmFATA1 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and GmFATA2 are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g349200 Gene Symbol: GmFATA1B Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation of GmFATA1B regulates seed oil content and composition in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G349200 Gene Symbol: GmFATA2 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and **GmFATA2 **are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmGPDHp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G218700 Gene Symbol: GmGPDHp1 Gene Name: Glycerol-3-phosphate Dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: These results reveal a key role for GmGPDHp1-mediated G3P metabolism in enhancing TAG synthesis and demonstrate a strategy to modify the FA compositions of soybean oils for improved nutrition and biofuel.

item.title: GmMFT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G244100;SoyZH13_05G229200 Gene Symbol: GmMFT Gene Name: MOTHER-OF-FT-AND-TFL1 Genome: Williams 82 (https://www.

item.title: GmPDAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13g108100 Gene Symbol: GmPDAT Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The candidate gene, GmPDAT, had higher expressional levels in high-oil and large-seed accessions than in low-oil and small-seed accessions.

item.title: GmPLDγ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01g42420 Gene Symbol: GmPLDγ Gene Name: Genome: Glyma.

item.title: GmSWEET10a;GmSWEET39
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.15G049200 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET10a GmSWEET39 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The selection of GmSWEET10a conferred simultaneous increases in soybean-seed size and oil content as well as a reduction in the protein content.

item.title: GmSWEET10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G183500 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET10b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Simultaneous changes in seed size, oil content and protein content driven by selection of SWEET homologues during soybean domestication.

item.title: GmWRI1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.15g221600 Gene Symbol: GmWRI1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmWRI1a is the functional counterpart of WRI1, whereas GmWRI1b exhibited reduced function in modulating seed oil biosynthesis.

item.title: GmWRI1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g227700 Gene Symbol: GmWRI1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmWRI1a is the functional counterpart of WRI1, whereas GmWRI1b exhibited reduced function in modulating seed oil biosynthesis.

item.title: KASIIa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17g047000 Gene Symbol: KASIIa Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The elongation of palmitic acid to stearic acid by the 3-ketoacyl-ACP synthase II (KASII) enzyme represents a branch point in the pathway of oil biosynthesis in soybean.

item.title: KASIIb
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13g112700 Gene Symbol: KASIIb Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The elongation of palmitic acid to stearic acid by the 3-ketoacyl-ACP synthase II (KASII) enzyme represents a branch point in the pathway of oil biosynthesis in soybean.

item.title: POWR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G085100 Gene Symbol: POWR1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: POWR1 is a domestication gene pleiotropically regulating seed quality and yield in soybean.

item.title: ST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g109100 Gene Symbol: ST1 Gene Name: Seed Thickness 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Identification of ST1 reveals a selection involving hitchhiking of seed morphology and oil content during soybean domestication.
